channel.title: i3 on FoxCorp
channel.description: Recent content in i3 on FoxCorp

item.title: My Arch Dotfiles
item.description: Some ppl has been asking me for my dotfiles, so I made a post about it. I use a fairly minimalistic set up with i3-gaps. I like i3-gaps since it’s fast and it makes me not reliant on a mouse. More info on the github page. I also tried to make an install script for this which needs some work. It’s also nice for me since now I can easily get everything working on other computers I get.
